00022 template <class ModelInterface> 
00023 class TSingleModelObserverBase: public CSingleModelObserverBase
00024 {
00025 public:
00026        typedef CSingleModelObserverBase BaseClass;
00027        typedef ModelInterface ModelType;
00028 
00029        TSingleModelObserverBase();
00030 
00031        ModelInterface* GetObjectPtr() const;
00032 
00033        // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
00034        virtual bool OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00035        virtual bool OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00036 
00037 protected:
00038        virtual ModelInterface* CastFromModel(imod::IModel* modelPtr) const;
00039 
00040 private:
00041        ModelInterface* m_objectPtr;
00042 };

00045 // public methods
00046 
00047 template <class ModelInterface> 
00048 TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::TSingleModelObserverBase()
00049 {
00050        m_objectPtr = NULL;
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 template <class ModelInterface> 
00055 ModelInterface* TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::GetObjectPtr() const
00056 {
00057        return m_objectPtr;
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
00062 
00063 template <class ModelInterface> 
00064 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00065 {
00066        m_objectPtr = CastFromModel(modelPtr);
00067 
00068        I_IF_DEBUG(
00069               if (m_objectPtr == NULL){
00070                      QString exptectedObjectInterface = typeid(ModelInterface).name();
00071 
00072                      QString debugMessage = QString("Data model interface is not supported by this observer. Expected interface is: %1").arg(exptectedObjectInterface);
00073 
00074                      qDebug(debugMessage.toUtf8());
00075               }
00076        )
00077 
00078        if ((m_objectPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::OnAttached(modelPtr)){
00079               return true;
00080        }
00081 
00082        BaseClass::EnsureModelDetached();
00083 
00084        return false;
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 template <class ModelInterface> 
00089 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00090 {
00091        if (BaseClass::OnDetached(modelPtr)){
00092               // If model was correctly attached m_objectPtr cannot be NULL. OnDetach returns true only if model was correctly attached.
00093               I_ASSERT(m_objectPtr != NULL);
00094 
00095               m_objectPtr = NULL;
00096 
00097               return true;
00098        }
00099 
00100        return false;
00101 }
00102

00104 // protected methods
00105 
00106 template <class ModelInterface> 
00107 typename ModelInterface* TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::CastFromModel(imod::IModel* modelPtr) const
00108 {
00109        return dynamic_cast<ModelInterface*>(modelPtr);
00110 }
